survey_responses.What do you think your life might be lik: Compared to today there will be scarcity of natural resources and everything will be much expensive
survey_responses.What is another dangerous outcome you ca: AI systems and robots replacing humans in most of the jobs
survey_responses.What is another positive outcome you can: With AI and robots doctors are able to do some surgeries which were not possible earlier but for this the system needs to well trained and calliberated and must be done in expert supervision.
survey_responses.What are the first decisions in your lif: I would not delegate any decisions of my life to an AI instead it can be used as an advisory tool.
survey_responses.Describe a concrete scenario where you w: For my financial decisions if AI makes a right xhoice then well and good. Otherwise if something goes wrong then there will be no accountability from AI.
survey_responses.Explain what makes one of these scenario: Scenario D makes better sense because new startups will emerge which will provide more jobs and different co.panies learning from each other will create a ecosystem of learning and development.
Scenario F males more sense to me as in scemario E companies that made these syatems may exploit understanding of human psychology.
survey_responses.What do you consider your culture? What: I consider my culture very greatful and cheerful. It has vast amount of histpry associated with it and with many things mentioned in it about ages and things which are present and true till date.
survey_responses.What is one unique perspective that your: The culture differences is important as it allows people to differentiate and identify themselves distinctly among a group
survey_responses.What is the biggest problem in your life: The biggest problem in my life ia the career tension.
survey_responses.What would you consider giving your life: People should be happy by doing things they like not by doing things which are necessary
survey_responses.What is something unique, that other peo: People living in harmony with each other with no grudges and war among countries
survey_responses.What are you most scared will be true in: A dystopian world with no resources with war all over the world
